title: Kings Court apartment for sale in Colombo 5 - LKR 37,500,000
details:
Kings Court apartment for sale in Colombo 5

- Fully furnished
- 3 Bedrooms
- 2 Bathrooms
- 2 Balconies
- Living and dining room
- 1,400 sqft
- Rooftop terrace
- Easy access to Galle road, Union place, Rajagiriya
- Close proximity to leading schools - Royal college, Ladies College, St.Bridget's Convent and etc.

To let us know how we can assist with your home search, please call us on +94 766 888 207 / +94 777 392 948 or email us at sales@acquest.lk and we will be happy to assist with more information and arrange a viewing.
